## RouteMetadata type

Route-specific metadata

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RouteMetadata<TConfig extends AdapterConfig> = {
    relativePath: string;
    rebuild: (parentPath: string) => RouteSpec<TConfig['baseElement']>;
};
```
**References:** [AdapterConfig](../view/adapterconfig/)<!-- -->, [RouteSpec](./routespec/)
